original: 大幅增加武將攻擊時造成致命一擊的機率。同時大幅提高武將的閃避率。戰鬥中武將會定期恢復少量體力。
text: Significantly increase the probability of a fatal blow when the generals attack. At the same time, the dodge rate of the generals is greatly increased. During the battle, the military will regularly recover a small amount of physical strength.
